About

Hi there, I am the designer and developer of the little ole site. I grew up in sunny southern California and about 5 years ago I decided to give the South a try and landed in Charlotte NC. This is where I have learned and sharpened my skills as a designer. Not to long ago I felt the need to further my design skills and learn web. I joined The Iron Yardâ€™s code academy and learned more than I ever thought I could. I not only learned front end development but I learned how to learn, as silly as that might sound. The code school has now set me up with a lifelong obsession with learning. Now I use what I have learned to craft and deliver quality experiences to both users and clients.
